Class AppointmentFormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AppointmentFormController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class AppointmentFormController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller for the add/edit appointment form.

        Checks whether the start time is before the end time.

        end - the appointment end
        Returns:
        true if start is before end

      • editAppointment

        public void editAppointment​(Appointment appointment)
        Sets up the form for editing an appointment. Sets form title text, populates fields, and changes the event handler for the save button.
        Parameters:
        appointment - the appointment to edit

      • updateAppointment

        private void updateAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event,
                               int userID)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Event handler for the update appointment button. Validates input fields and updates appointment in the database.
        Parameters:
        event - the button fire event
        userID - the ID of the assigned user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • showAppointments

        private void showAppointments​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the appointments view.
        Parameters:
        event - the event from the button clicked.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • hasNoConflictingAppointment

        private boolean hasNoConflictingAppointment​(int customerID,
                                            java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                            java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                            int appointmentID)
        Checks if customer has conflicting appointments. Generates an alert if a conflicting appointment is found.
        Parameters:
        customerID - The id of the customer
        start - The appointment start time
        end - the appointment end time
        appointmentID - the appointment ID
        Returns:
        true if no conflicting appointments found.

      • isWithinBusinessHours

        private boolean isWithinBusinessHours​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        Checks whether the appointment is within business hours of 8am to 10pm EST.
        Parameters:
        start - appointment start time
        end - appointment end time
        Returns:
        true if appointment is within business hours
